CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, December 21, 1957, pg. A18 reads: "AWRT Party - Christmas cam early for members of the American Women in Radio and TV. Saturday, WJAS' Jane-Ellen Ball entertained the entire club group at luncheon and a party at her charmingly pink apartment [apartment] in Pennsylvania Apartments. A grab bag, special gifts and movies of a Hawaiian trip made a perfect Saturday fete.  Miss Ball is shown seated, third from the right.  Behind her is Kay Newman, pretty and plump TV food expert.   To her right is Ida Mae Stilley Maher, "mother" of Happy, the tooth brush exponent of TV.  Mrs. Ball, standing rear right, was co-hostess with her famous daughter.  Miss Ball is president of the Pittsburgh chapter of AWRT. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: American Women in Radio and TV members, including Toki Schalk Johnson standing on left, Jane-Ellen Ball seated third from right, Kay Newman seated behind, Hazel Garland seated next to bookcase, and Ida Mae Stilley Maher seated against doorway, in Ball home, Pennsylvania Apartments
